title: If a champion's dance speed scaled with their movement speed...
body:
Ok, so someone suggested Master Yi's dance speed scaled with his movement speed, and Riot thought that was pretty awesome and put it in in just a few minutes (which did go live). ChickenVVrap just proposed Rammus do the same, and that got me thinking about a question I'd like to ask you guys;

#*What champion (or skin) would have the most hilarious dance if it sped up with your movement speed?*

replies.body: Tahm Kench.
pitch increases with speed
Eventually becomes a piccolo (Don't ask how the physics work)
Bayou -> Bluegrass?
{{champion:19}} Thriller -> Thrillest
{{champion:268}} {{champion:150}}  OMFG GNAR WOULD BE AMAZING  {{champion:115}}
Gnar's sounds hilarious XD
I'm thinking of him rapidly spinning in circles doing light speed backflips screaming gibberish now
{{champion:30}} My name is Karthus Deathsinger, and I am the fastest headbanger alive...ish.
{{champion:27}}: Pops {{item:3800}} and dances aggressively at you.

> [{quoted}](name=Escheton,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ePKLWhXa,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2017-06-20T05:06:24.849+0000)
>
> {{champion:27}}: Pops {{item:3800}} and dances aggressively at you.

It would probably become a "spin to win" meme. XDXDXD
{{champion:163}} she would look like she was on every kind of drug
{{champion:12}} "You can't milk these moves"
donkdonkdonkdonkdonkdonkdonkdonkdonkdonkdonk
who said there wasn't enough cowbell? This change would satiate them.
Star Guardian Jinx imho, but that's probably just me.
Why not speed up her laugh animation instead?

Heimer...
With the new update, we are introducing fidget spinners in League
{{champion:75}} For sure, {{champion:136}} {{champion:268}} (JAZZERCISE!) {{champion:86}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:106}}
{{champion:201}}  "Rusia style intensifies when you buy boots"

{{champion:98}} So it looks normal to spam
~~Totally not a once Shen main who is salty about early game meta~~
{{champion:101}} would be awesome... too bad he's pretty slow most of the time.
{{champion:76}} speedy strip.
{{champion:120}}
{{champion:4}} and {{champion:85}} would both be hilarious.

{{champion:420}} Back and forth and back and forth and back and forth (Play this at 2x speed https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ymYw1zRSYrI)
{{champion:51}} Helicopter 
{{champion:76}} no comment
{{champion:412}} {{champion:119}} fidget spinners
{{champion:21}} would start to look like she's doing something more erotic.
infernal nasus

{{champion:44}} 

He will be shakin' that ass so fast that all of the women (and Ezreal) would stop and stare. It is the ultimate CC.
Can't touch this
{{champion:9}} or {{champion:48}} IMO.
{{champion:267}}  The fish has become a helicopter.

{{champion:3}} 
M'lady
mecha zero {{champion:14}}
aether wing kayle. because https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aTBlKRzNf74 but faster is amusing.

Ultimate Bard Dance.
